work.name: University of Enginering and Technology, Vietnam National University, Hanoi

education.institution: University of Enginering and Technology, Vietnam National University, Hanoi

publications.name: CodeMMLU: A Multi-Task Benchmark for Assessing Code Understanding Capabilities of CodeLLMs
publications.summary: We present CodeMMLU, a comprehensive multiple-choice question-answer benchmark designed to evaluate the depth of software and code understanding in LLMs.

publications.name: The Vault: A Comprehensive Multilingual Dataset for Advancing Code Understanding and Generation
publications.summary: The Vault, a dataset of high-quality code-text pairs in multiple programming languages for training large language models to understand and generate code.

projects.name: Code LLMs evaluator
projects.summary: Effective universal library for evaluating language model with instant fast inference.

projects.name: CodeText-parser
projects.summary: Tree-sitter custom toolkit for break abstract syntax tree (AST) into code (i.e. function, class) properties.

projects.name: Vi-Medicine
projects.summary: Vietnamese illness prediction based on symtomps and medical suggestion, powered by Language models agent and retrieval component.
